subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Brett Favre did not report for the start of training camp after the Packers’ general manager asked for a few more days to resolve the impasse that has captivated the N.F.L.
snippet: Brett Favre did not report for the start of training camp after the Packers’ general manager asked for a few more days to resolve the impasse that has captivated the N.F.L.
